title: K-12 Drawing Analogy Science Course for Analogical Reasoning and Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and ability to use simple digital tools
context.additional_context: A course aiming to enhance similarity-based reasoning skills and conceptual understanding in a microlearning environment using digital devices. It partially incorporates science elements from the UK National Curriculum Key Stage 3

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain similarities between concepts with over 80% accuracy through drawings that visually analogize scientific phenomena.
Learners can explain complex scientific theories by connecting them to three or more real-world examples through drawing analogy activities.
After completing microlearning modules, learners achieve at least 75% proficiency in applying analogous reasoning in formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
